Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; designation of a "naditu" as heir by her mother, the "naditu's" heir to one of her brothers; Old Babylonian; loose fragment broken from object.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.217)
Condition: Incomplete; nearly complete; loose fragment broken from object.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
